connSetup_useAlphaShape.description: by default, use convex hull to compute outer polygon (0 or []), otherwise use AlphaShape (1)

connSetup_holeThreshold.description: Maximum area or volume of interior holes or voids to fill in, specified as a finite, nonnegative scalar.

connSetup_bufferDist.description: buffer distance [m] by which to offset boundaries of polyshape for auto-defining connectivity

connSetup_cluster_iter.description: number of iterations to complete in cluster analysis

connSetup_showCheckPlots.description: 0 = do not show cluster check plots, 1 = show them

connSetup_saveCheckPlots.description: 0 = do not save cluster check plots, 1 = save them

connSetup_perimeterPolFile.description: .pol file containing perimeter polygon to manually limit extents

connectivity_PolFile.description: .pol file containing polygons for connectivity analysis

plot_mgmtPolygons_PolFile.description: polygons for comparing management cells to connectivity modules

connectivity_mergePolygonMode.description: merge polygons via: 1 = default mode (counting pixels) or 2 = merging nearby polygons
